Config.Name: Discord Webhook URL
Config.Description: Discord webhook URL for sending notifications. Create a webhook in your Discord server settings.

Config.Name: Test Mode
Config.Description: Enable test mode to send multiple notifications per session for testing. Default: false

Config.Name: Single Run
Config.Description: Run once and exit instead of looping continuously. Default: false

Config.Name: Output Directory
Config.Description: Directory for logs and session data. Default: /data
